HDG.BC.content: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)

HDG.FS.content: for Husserl, substantiality [categorial?], non-appearance, (of book), enables what appears to appear, more apparent that what itself appears > w/ categorial intution, Husserl freed being from its attachment to judgment reorients entire field of investigation > if Heidegger poses question of meaning of being, must already be beyond being, understood as being of beings [Befragte: Being; das Erfragte: meaning of Being]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Husserl, substantiality [categorial?], non-appearance, (of book), enables what appears to appear, more apparent that what itself appears > w/ categorial intution, Husserl freed being from its attachment to judgment reorients entire field of investigation > if Heidegger poses question of meaning of being, must already be beyond being, understood as being of beings [Befragte: Being; das Erfragte: meaning of Being]

HDG.EC.content: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]

HDG.OHF.content: epistemology still doesn’t understand that all theories of judgment are im Grunde theories of presentation (Vorstellungstheorie)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: epistemology still doesn’t understand that all theories of judgment are im Grunde theories of presentation (Vorstellungstheorie)

HDG.OHF.content: [on destruction] fundamental historical critique > dismantling (Abbau) takes its departure from presentation of today’s situation > when tradition is critically dismantled, no longer get bogged down in seemingly important problems [arrival?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [on destruction] fundamental historical critique > dismantling (Abbau) takes its departure from presentation of today’s situation > when tradition is critically dismantled, no longer get bogged down in seemingly important problems [arrival?]

HDG.OHF.content: significance not a characteristic of things but of being > theories re: actuality (Wirklichkeit) and reality need to be subjected (unterwerfen) to critical phenomenological destruction: such a critique only actualized (vollziehen) from out of positive insight (Sicht) [already attend to Being?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: significance not a characteristic of things but of being > theories re: actuality (Wirklichkeit) and reality need to be subjected (unterwerfen) to critical phenomenological destruction: such a critique only actualized (vollziehen) from out of positive insight (Sicht) [already attend to Being?]

HDG.OHF.content: since Parmenides [does his reading of Parmenides change?], “perceptual mean-ing (vernehmendes Vermeinen)” and Being are the same [noien and einai], 1st fundamental insight (Grundeinsicht) of idealism (traditional ontology/logic stand w/in the fate of Parmenidean interpretation) (no accident Husserl still characterizing intentionality as “noetic”) > recovering (Gewinnung) a primordial situation presupposes critique of development of intellectual history
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: since Parmenides [does his reading of Parmenides change?], “perceptual mean-ing (vernehmendes Vermeinen)” and Being are the same [noien and einai], 1st fundamental insight (Grundeinsicht) of idealism (traditional ontology/logic stand w/in the fate of Parmenidean interpretation) (no accident Husserl still characterizing intentionality as “noetic”) > recovering (Gewinnung) a primordial situation presupposes critique of development of intellectual history
